name: Dice is your Daddy
description:
This game is made for GMTK Game Jam 2022 with about 27 hours of effort.  It is about a man who struggles with gambling addiction.

Credits

Developer - Batu Eren

Artist- Batu Eren

Some sound effects are obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com/

Final Battle Music : "Tyrant" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
